title: Hoops Tonight - Could Lebron and Kyrie reunite + 5 things I learned this year.
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Could Lebron and Kyrie reunite + 5 things I learned this year.
description:
Jason discusses the rumors of Kyrie and the Nets being at an impasse, plus breaks down the 5 biggest lessons he learned in the 2022 NBA season. #Herd
